lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown of California says he wants voters to approve a ballot measure in November that would affect thousands of state prison inmates and significantly change current law.

headline.print_headline: California: Brown Seeks Changes in Sentencing Laws
headline.main: California: Brown Seeks Changes in Sentencing Laws

snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown of California says he wants voters to approve a ballot measure in November that would affect thousands of state prison inmates and significantly change current law.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown proposes ballot measure for November election that will include several drastic changes to sentencing laws in effort to reduce prison population in state.
